00143 inline void CCalibratedViewBase::SetGridVisible(bool state)
00144 {
00145        if (m_isGridVisible != state){
00146               m_isGridVisible = state;
00147               InvalidateBackground();
00148        }
00149 }
00150 
00151 
00152 inline void CCalibratedViewBase::SetMinGridDistance(double gridDistance)
00153 {
00154        if (m_minGridDistance != gridDistance){
00155               m_minGridDistance = gridDistance;
00156               if (m_isGridVisible){
00157                      SetBackgroundBufferValid(false);
00158               }
00159        }
00160 }
00161 
00162 
00163 inline void CCalibratedViewBase::SetGridInMm(bool state)
00164 {
00165        if (m_isGridInMm != state){
00166               m_isGridInMm = state;
00167               SetBackgroundBufferValid(false);
00168        }
00169 }
